description:
Born into the Isurugi ninja clan. Though she is expected to succeed her http://anidb.net/character/101584 [grandfather] as the head of the clan, she looks up to her http://anidb.net/character/101582 [father] very much and wishes to follow in his footsteps to become a researcher.
Source: Official page
name: Isurugi Rikka
